text: A liger is a mix between a male lion (Panthera leo) and a female tiger (Panthera tigris). It is different from a similar mix called a tigon and is the biggest of all known extant cats. Males don't always have a mane. == Other websites == * Liger Tribute * Liger Video of Sinbad (900 pound liger) * Liger Pictures Liger Pictures from the Animal Safari in Pine Mountain Georgia * The Liger Exists Category:Panthera Category:Animal hybrids
title: Liger
